ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ pounds black cod (sablefish) fillets, cut into large pieces
1 (3 inch) piece ginger, peeled and cut into matchsticks
2 green onions, cut into 1-inch pieces, or more to taste
3 tablespoons soy sauce, or more to taste

cookingTips: Bring poaching liquid to a gentle simmer with aromatics before adding fish to ensure delicate cooking
Poach fish for 6-8 minutes until flesh is just opaque; avoid aggressive boiling that breaks the fish
Drizzle with sesame oil just before serving to highlight the fish's delicate flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you poach delicate black cod so it remains moist and tender while absorbing the aromatic ginger-soy flavors?
